operations.body:
query cosmo_getBookPlaylistUrl($bookFileCode: String!) {
  webfront_bookPlaylistUrl(bookFileCode: $bookFileCode) {
    playToken
    playTokenHash
    productCode
    saleTypeCode
    bookFileCode
    bookFileTypeCode
    licenseUrl
    playlistBaseUrl
    playlistUrl {
      ubooks {
        content
        coverImage
        isEncrypted
        name
        scale
        __typename
      }
      version
      __typename
    }
    resumePoint
    completeFlg
    kanaSyllabaryText
    penNameKana
    webtoonFlg
    __typename
  }
}

operations.name: cosmo_getBookRanking
cosmo_getEpisodeDetail
operations.body:
query cosmo_getEpisodeDetail($code: ID!, $episodeCode: ID!) {
  webfront_title_stage(id: $code) {
    id
    titleName
    productionYear
    missingAlertText
    nextUpdateDateTime
    copyright
    mainGenreId
    episode(id: $episodeCode) {
      id
      episodeName
      purchaseEpisodeLimitday
      thumbnail {
        standard
        __typename
      }
      duration
      displayNo
      interruption
      completeFlag
      saleTypeCode
      introduction
      saleText
      episodeNotices
      isNew
      hasPackRights
      minimumPrice
      hasMultiplePrices
      productLineupCodeList
      isPurchased
      purchaseEpisodeLimitday
      __typename
    }
    publicMainEpisodeCount
    __typename
  }
  webfront_title_relatedTitles(id: $code) {
    id
    groupName
    titles {
      ...TitleCard
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  webfront_title_relatedBooks(id: $code, pageSize: 20, page: 1) {
    pageInfo {
      ...PageInfo
      __typename
    }
    books {
      ...BookTitleCard
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

fragment BookCard on Book {
  code
  name
  mediaType {
    code
    __typename
  }
  thumbnail {
    standard
    __typename
  }
  publisher {
    code
    name
    __typename
  }
  credits {
    personCode
    penName
    __typename
  }
  publishedIn {
    name
    __typename
  }
  isPreorderable
  publicStartDateTime
  __typename
}

fragment BookTitleCard on BookSakuhin {
  sakuhinCode: code
  name
  rate
  freeBookNum
  isNew
  isSale
  book {
    ...BookCard
    __typename
  }
  minPrice
  hasMultiplePrices
  totalBookNum
  isUnextOriginal
  paymentBadgeList {
    id
    code
    __typename
  }
  bookViewCode
  featurePieceCode
  subgenreTagList {
    name
    __typename
  }
  recentLicenseExpiredDatetime
  isChapter
  hasUnreadChapter
  isBookSakuhinTicketAvailable
  isBookPlusTicketAvailable
  __typename
}

fragment PageInfo on PortalPageInfo {
  page
  pages
  pageSize
  results
  __typename
}

fragment TitleCard on Title {
  id
  titleName
  isNew
  catchphrase
  rate
  productionYear
  updateOfWeek
  lastEpisode
  nfreeBadge
  hasSubtitle
  hasDub
  paymentBadgeList {
    id
    code
    __typename
  }
  productLineupCodeList
  thumbnail {
    standard
    secondary
    __typename
  }
  hasPackRights
  hasMultiprice
  minimumPrice
  isOriginal
  isMaxService
  exclusive {
    isOnlyOn
    typeCode
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

operations.name: cosmo_getFavoriteTitles

cosmo_getLive
cosmo_getLiveDetail
operations.body:
query cosmo_getLiveDetail($liveCode: ID!) {
  webfront_getLive(id: $liveCode) {
    id
    name
    description
    attractions
    copyright
    note
    viewableDeviceText
    displayLiveMinute
    venue
    location
    deliveryStartDateTime
    deliveryEndDateTime
    displaySaleEndDateTime
    performanceStartDateTime
    isOnlyOn
    saleTypeCode
    allowsTimeshiftedPlayback
    timeshiftedPlaybackAllowedUntil
    paymentBadgeList {
      id
      name
      code
      __typename
    }
    subContentList {
      typeCode
      publicStartDateTime
      publicEndDateTime
      __typename
    }
    notices {
      id
      typeCode
      publicStartDateTime
      thumbnail {
        standard
        secondary
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    tickets {
      id
      name
      saleStartDateTime
      saleEndDateTime
      price
      __typename
    }
    purchased
    productLineupCodeList
    hasPackRights
    testLiveId
    credits {
      personNameCode
      personName
      characterName
      castTypeName
      personCode
      __typename
    }
    hasPackRights
    caution
    announcements {
      title
      body
      url
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

operations.name: cosmo_getLiveDetailRelatedStuffs

cosmo_getPostPlay
operations.body:
query cosmo_getPostPlay($code: String) {
  webfront_postPlay(code: $code) {
    resultType
    nextEpisode {
      ...PostPlay
      __typename
    }
    recommendations {
      ...PostPlay
      lastEpisode
      updateOfWeek
      nextUpdateDateTime
      catchphrase
      mainCast {
        personNameCode
        personName
        characterName
        castTypeName
        personCode
        __typename
      }
      rate
      productionYear
      minimumPrice
      hasMultiprice
      isNew
      hasSubtitle
      hasDub
      saleText
      country
      duration
      nfreeBadge
      isOriginal
      exclusive {
        isOnlyOn
        typeCode
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

fragment PostPlay on PostPlayItem {
  episodeCode
  titleCode
  titleName
  episodeName
  displayNo
  productLineupCodeList
  paymentBadgeList {
    id
    code
    name
    __typename
  }
  thumbnail {
    standard
    secondary
    __typename
  }
  hasPackRights
  publicMainEpisodeCount
  isMaxService
  __typename
}

cosmo_getVideoTitle
operations.body:
query cosmo_getVideoTitle($code: ID!) {
  webfront_title_stage(id: $code) {
    id
    titleName
    rate
    userRate
    productionYear
    country
    catchphrase
    attractions
    story
    check
    seriesCode
    seriesName
    publicStartDate
    displayPublicEndDate
    restrictedCode
    copyright
    mainGenreId
    bookmarkStatus
    thumbnail {
      standard
      secondary
      __typename
    }
    mainGenreName
    isNew
    exclusive {
      typeCode
      isOnlyOn
      __typename
    }
    isOriginal
    lastEpisode
    updateOfWeek
    nextUpdateDateTime
    productLineupCodeList
    hasMultiprice
    minimumPrice
    country
    productionYear
    paymentBadgeList {
      id
      name
      code
      __typename
    }
    nfreeBadge
    hasDub
    hasSubtitle
    saleText
    currentEpisode {
      id
      interruption
      duration
      completeFlag
      displayDurationText
      existsRelatedEpisode
      playButtonName
      purchaseEpisodeLimitday
      __typename
    }
    publicMainEpisodeCount
    comingSoonMainEpisodeCount
    missingAlertText
    sakuhinNotices
    hasPackRights
    __typename
  }
}

operations.name: cosmo_getVideoTitleEpisodes
operations.body:
query cosmo_getVideoTitleEpisodes($code: ID!, $page: Int, $pageSize: Int) {
  webfront_title_titleEpisodes(id: $code, page: $page, pageSize: $pageSize) {
    episodes {
      id
      episodeName
      purchaseEpisodeLimitday
      thumbnail {
        standard
        __typename
      }
      duration
      displayNo
      interruption
      completeFlag
      saleTypeCode
      introduction
      saleText
      episodeNotices
      isNew
      hasPackRights
      minimumPrice
      hasMultiplePrices
      productLineupCodeList
      isPurchased
      purchaseEpisodeLimitday
      __typename
    }
    pageInfo {
      ...PageInfo
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

fragment PageInfo on PortalPageInfo {
  page
  pages
  pageSize
  results
  __typename
}

cosmo_personSearchVideo
operations.body:
query cosmo_personSearchVideo($personCode: ID!, $personNameCode: ID!, $page: Int, $pageSize: Int, $sortOrder: PortalSortOrder!, $filterSaleType: SaleType, $mainGenreId: String) {
  webfront_searchVideo(
    personCode: $personCode
    personNameCode: $personNameCode
    page: $page
    pageSize: $pageSize
    sortOrder: $sortOrder
    filterSaleType: $filterSaleType
    mainGenreId: $mainGenreId
  ) {
    personName
    titles {
      ...TitleCard
      __typename
    }
    pageInfo {
      ...PageInfo
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

fragment PageInfo on PortalPageInfo {
  page
  pages
  pageSize
  results
  __typename
}

fragment TitleCard on Title {
  id
  titleName
  isNew
  catchphrase
  rate
  productionYear
  updateOfWeek
  lastEpisode
  nfreeBadge
  hasSubtitle
  hasDub
  paymentBadgeList {
    id
    code
    __typename
  }
  productLineupCodeList
  thumbnail {
    standard
    secondary
    __typename
  }
  hasPackRights
  hasMultiprice
  minimumPrice
  isOriginal
  isMaxService
  exclusive {
    isOnlyOn
    typeCode
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

operations.body:
query cosmo_userInfo {
  userInfo {
    id
    multiAccountId
    userPlatformId
    userPlatformCode
    superUser
    age
    otherFunctionId
    points
    hasRegisteredEmail
    billingCaution {
      title
      description
      suggestion
      linkUrl
      __typename
    }
    blockInfo {
      isBlocked
      score
      __typename
    }
    siteCode
    accountTypeCode
    linkedAccountIssuer
    needsAdultViewingRights
    __typename
  }
}
